about_the_game:
Grab your hoverboard and take to the skies with the original soundtrack to TrickStyle! This soundtrack includes all songs from the Dreamcast classic title.

Tracklist:

1. Main Menu Music
2. Track 1
3. Track 2
4. Track 3
5. Track 4
6. Track 5
7. Track 6
8. Track 7
9. Track 8
10. Track 9
11. Track 10

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Any
  • Processor: 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB VRAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2+ Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB VRAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
